components.description:
The face of a frog, the hopping amphibian. Generally depicted as a friendly, cartoon-styled, light-green frog looking straight ahead, with large eyes, slightly open mouth, and nostrils.

Popularly paired with ‚òïÔ∏è Hot Beverage to represent the But That’s None of My Business meme (used for gossip or sarcasm) or Pepe the Frog (associated with trolling and the alt-right).

Facebook’s design previously resembled Kermit the Frog.
components.title: Frog Face

description:
The face of a frog, the hopping amphibian. Generally depicted as a friendly, cartoon-styled, light-green frog looking straight ahead, with large eyes, slightly open mouth, and nostrils.

Popularly paired with ‚òïÔ∏è Hot Beverage to represent the But That’s None of My Business meme (used for gossip or sarcasm) or Pepe the Frog (associated with trolling and the alt-right).

Facebook’s design previously resembled Kermit the Frog.
title: Frog Face

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Animal faces
emoji_net_data.definition: A frog emoji, showing the green face of a¬†frog, with large eyes and mouth. Sometimes used in conjunction with the ????¬†hot beverage to symbo http://emojipedia.org/frog-face/
emoji_net_data.name: frog face

bn:00023876n: A harsh hoarse utterance (as of a frog)

bn:00004795n: Any anuran amphibian of the family Bufonidae, such as Bufo bufo of Europe. They are similar to frogs but are more terrestrial, having a drier warty skin.
The frog is a small hopping amphibian in the order Anura.
Any of various tailless stout-bodied amphibians with long hind limbs for leaping; semiaquatic and terrestrial species

Any insectivorous anuran amphibian of the family Ranidae, such as Rana temporaria of Europe, having a short squat tailless body with a moist smooth skin and very long hind legs specialized for hopping.
A small tailless amphibian of the order Anura that typically hops
A toad is any of a number of species of amphibians in the order Anura that are characterized by dry, leathery skin, short legs, and snout-like parotoid glands.
An amphibian similar to a frog with bigger back legs and more ragged skin.
Frogs are a diverse and largely carnivorous group of short-bodied, tailless amphibians composing the order Anura.
